lead_paragraph: The Lower Manhattan Cultural Council has chosen Sam Miller, a veteran arts consultant and cultural policy expert, as its new president.
snippet: The Lower Manhattan Cultural Council has chosen Sam Miller, a veteran arts consultant and cultural policy expert, as its new president.

headline.main: Lower Manhattan Cultural Council Picks Sam Miller as Its President
headline.print_headline: Lower Manhattan Cultural Council Picks Sam Miller as Its President

byline.original: By RANDY KENNEDY; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
